ModMetaData.name: Better Electronics
ModMetaData.author: adam0310
ModMetaData.description:
Electronics will never breakdown! Prevents random short circuits! Prevents solar flare!
Incompatibility: None Old Save Compatible: Yes Safely Removable: Yes
Translations: English Polish
